channel.title: Type Script on Hope| It's Our blog
channel.description: Recent content in Type Script on Hope| It's Our blog

item.title: Centralized vs Decentralized vs Distributed
item.description: Centralized Systems Presence of a global clock One single central unit Single point of failure Architecture of Centralized Systems Client Server Architecture Decentralized Systems Lack of a global clock Multiple central units (Computers/Nodes/Servers) Dependent failure of components Architecture of Decentralized Systems Master/Slave Architecture

item.title: What is pipe for in rxJS
item.description: RxJS RxJS is a library for reactive programming using Observables, to make it easier to compose asynchronous or callback-based code.
